ygData.subject: Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank.  Although I have a fine steel long sword, I can t seem to get enough loot to buy any decent armor.  I am in east commons
ygData.messageBody:
I am a brave warrior of the 12th Rank. Although I have a fine steel long
sword, I can't seem to get enough loot to buy any decent armor. I am in
east commons now headed back to Halas and I only have 10 plat in the bank.
Help! Where should I be hunting to get loot!

p.s. On top of that, I know once I get decent armor it will weigh me down.
What is avalible at higher ranks to increase my strength (currently a paltry
130)?

For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;

Patty of Halas
username: Patricia
server: Bristlebane
